data.message: Eminem please stop touring in other country's. America is what made you famous! So come to america! We love you!!!

replies.message: what do you mean ? we don't deserve him !! -_-
Thats bullshit coming out of ur mouth
Bull shit.we are also his fans

No Lexi he made himself famous - America has nothing to do with it - he is the star and he came to South Africa now for the first time and I have been a fan like forever.  Stupid comments like this will irritate people it doesn't mean just because we are not American we don't deserve to be honoured with him touring our countries.  That makes me respect an artist, he also thinks of his fans in other countries.

Sharing is caring:-)... I'm sure the RapGod would agree :-P!... And, Em came to here to South Africa because he knows AFRICAN americans created rap and that AFRICAN americans come from africa and so he had to come grace us with his presence! Even if it took him forever to come here. Eventually he came... He perfected our culture (Rap)
